description.en: Attacks an enemy, and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description.kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
description.jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。
description.zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

description.en: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Mage</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Attack. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color>.
description.kr: (발동 효과) 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>마법형</color> 캐릭터가 공격했을 때 공격력이 가장 높은 적에게 추가 공격을 합니다. 공격 후 자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 증가합니다.
description.jp: (発動効果)<color=#28d9ed>魔法型</color>の味方が攻撃時、攻撃力が最も高い敵単体に追加攻撃を与える。攻撃後、自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>UPする。
description.zh: (触发效果)友军中<color=#28d9ed>魔法型</color>角色攻击时,对攻击力最高的敌人发动额外攻击。攻击后,自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>。

description.en: Attacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)\nAfter attacking, grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태로 만듭니다. (2회 적용)\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>을 증가시킵니다.
description.jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>2個を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。
description.zh: 攻击全体敌人,并使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。(叠加2次)\n攻击后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>和<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。
